processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was transferred from the Rare Book Division on May 2, 1989.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Final rehearsal script adapted for radio by Robert Anderson and produced by The Theatre Guild, Inc. This performance, presented on "The United States Steel Hour," starred Shirley Booth and Gary Cooper.

did.unittitle: Uncorrected final rehearsal script for the United States Steel Hour presentation of The Threatre Guild on the Air starring Garry Cooper and Shirley Booth in Come Back, Little Shebaby William Inge, adapted for Radio by Robert Anderson and produced by The Theatre Guild, Inc. 1951 Feb 4
